description: After an instance is migrated to a new compute node unplug_vifs was never called on the original compute node. This was already fixed once 6b6633 but seemed to have some how regressed.

comments.content: Is this only an issue if you're using Neutron?  The commit referenced above was for live migration but the patch is fixing the resize flow.  Also, the commit above merged in Folsom so apparently this hasn't been a big problem when at least using nova-network - is there a periodic task in the nova network manager that garbage collects the vifs leftover from migrations?
